comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sidney_Bechet Drummer Freddie Moore is seen at left; he died at age 92 in 1992. Bechet's student Bob Wilber recalled that at Ryan's Bechet and pianist Lloyd Phillips would challenge each other by seeing who could remember the most obcure old tune, which they would then jam on beautifully.

comment.author: 7667840@N07
comment._content: See a version of this without Lloyd or Freddie at ClancysPrintShop.smugmug.com
